list.title: Welcome Examples
list.description: Examples with checkbox, sort, pagination, export, editable and other added features.

list.title: From HTML
list.description: Use data-toggle="table" attribute to transform table from an existing, unformatted html table.

list.title: From Data
list.description: Use data option to load data json.

list.title: From URL
list.description: Use url option to load json.

list.title: Modal Table
list.description: Use Bootstrap Table in modal.

list.title: Modal Table
list.description: Use Bootstrap Table in modal.

list.title: Modal Table
list.description: Use Bootstrap Table in modal.

list.title: Modal Table
list.description: Use Bootstrap Table in modal.

list.title: Modal Table
list.description: Use Bootstrap Table in modal.

list.title: Modal Table
list.description: Use Bootstrap Table in modal.

list.title: Group Columns
list.description: Use rowspan, colspan options to set the group columns header.

list.title: Sub Table
list.description: Supports sub table.

list.title: Multiple Table
list.description: Multiple tables in one page.

list.title: Flat Json
list.description: Support flat json, for example: data-field="github.count.stargazers".

list.title: Large Data
list.description: Use virtualScroll to enable the virtual scroll to play with large data sets (10000 rows).

list.title: Vue Component
list.description: Use Plugin: Vue.js and bootstrap-table-vue.

list.title: Table Height
list.description: Use height option to enable fixed header of table.

list.title: Table Classes
list.description: Use classes option to set the styles.

list.title: Thead Classes
list.description: Use theadClasses option to set the styles.

list.title: Row Style
list.description: Use rowStyle option to set the row style.

list.title: Row Attributes
list.description: Use rowAttributes option to set the row attributes.

list.title: Undefined Text
list.description: Use undefinedText option to set undefined text.

list.title: Table Locale
list.description: Use locale option to set the i18n.

list.title: Table Sortable
list.description: Use sortable option to set the basic sort.

list.title: Sort Class
list.description: Use sortClass option to set the class name of the td elements which are sorted.

list.title: Silent Sort
list.description: Use silentSort: false option to sort the data with loading message.

list.title: Sort Name Order
list.description: Use sortName and sortOrder options to define which column and order will be sorted.

list.title: Sort Stable
list.description: Use sortStable option to get a stable sorting.

list.title: Remember Order
list.description: Use rememberOrder option to remember the order for each column.

list.title: Custom Sort
list.description: Use customSort option to custom sort by the number instead of string.

list.title: Table Columns
list.description: Use columns option to the table columns.

list.title: Table Method
list.description: Use method option to the method type to request remote data.

list.title: Table Cache
list.description: Use cache: false option to disable caching of AJAX requests.

list.title: Content Type
list.description: Use contentType option to the contentType of request remote data, for example application/x-www-form-urlencoded.

list.title: Data Type
list.description: Use dataType option to the type of data that you are expecting back from the server, for example text. In this case, we need to use responseHandler to handle the response data.

list.title: Table AJAX
list.description: Use ajax option to replace ajax call. Should implement the same API as jQuery ajax method.

list.title: AJAX Options
list.description: Use ajaxOptions option to set the Additional options for submit ajax reques, for example we can use beforeSend option to send the custom request header.

list.title: Query Params
list.description: Use queryParams option to send additional parameters, in this case we send search=8 to the server.

list.title: Query Params Type
list.description: Use queryParamsType option to send the difference query params.

list.title: Response Handler
list.description: Use responseHandler option to handle the response data.

list.title: Total/Data Field
list.description: Use totalField and dataField options to custom the response keys. In this case, we use count and items keys.

list.title: Table Pagination
list.description: Use pagination option to show a pagination toolbar on table bottom.

list.title: Only Info Pagination
list.description: Use onlyInfoPagination option to show only the quantity of the data.

list.title: Show Extended Pagination
list.description: Use showExtendedPagination option to show a extended version of pagination (including the count of all rows with out filters).

list.title: Total Not Filtered Field
list.description: Use totalNotFilteredField option to set the field from the json response which will used for showExtendedPagination.

list.title: Pagination Loop
list.description: Use paginationLoop: false option to disable pagination continuous loop mode.

list.title: Client Side Pagination
list.description: Use sidePagination to to define the client side pagination of table.

list.title: Server Side Pagination
list.description: Use sidePagination: \'server\' option to define the server side pagination of table.

list.title: Show Button Icon
list.description: Use showButtonIcons to show icons on buttons.

list.title: Show Button Text
list.description: Use showButtonText to show text on buttons.

list.title: Page Number
list.description: Use pageNumber option to initialize the page number.

list.title: Page Size
list.description: Use pageSize option to initialize the page size.

list.title: Page List
list.description: Use pageList option to initialize the page size selecting list.

list.title: Pagination H Align
list.description: Use paginationHAlign and paginationDetailHAlign options to align the pagination.

list.title: Pagination V Align
list.description: Use paginationVAlign option to vertical align the pagination.

list.title: Pagination Text
list.description: Use paginationPreText and paginationNextText option to indicate the previous and next buttons.

list.title: Pagination Index Number
list.description: Use options to control the index number of the pagination.

list.title: Table Search
list.description: Use search option to enable the search input.

list.title: Search On Enter Key
list.description: Use searchOnEnterKey option to enable the feature of search method will be executed until the Enter key is pressed.

list.title: Strict Search
list.description: Use strictSearch option to Enable the strict search.

list.title: Visible Search
list.description: Use visibleSearch to search only in visible column/data, if the data contains other values which are not displayed they will be ignored while searching.

list.title: Show Search Button
list.description: Use showSearchButton to show a search Button behind the search input.

list.title: Show Search Clear Button
list.description: Use showSearchClearButton to show a clear Button behind the search input.

list.title: Trim On Search
list.description: Use trimOnSearch: false option to disable trim spaces in search field.

list.title: Search Align
list.description: Use searchAlign: \'left\' option to indicate how to align the search input.

list.title: Search Time Out
list.description: Use searchTimeOut option to set timeout for search fire, in this case we set to 1000.

list.title: Search Text
list.description: Use searchText option to initialize the search text.

list.title: Custom Search
list.description: Use customSearch option to custom search function is executed instead of built-in search function. In this case, we only search the price column.

list.title: Show Header
list.description: Use showHeader: false option to hide the table header.

list.title: Show Footer
list.description: Use showFooter option to show the summary footer row.

list.title: Footer Style
list.description: Use footerStyle option to set the footer style formatter function.

list.title: Basic Columns
list.description: Use showColumns to show the columns drop down list.

list.title: Columns Toggle All
list.description: Use showColumnsToggleAll to show an toggle all checkbox for the columns option.

list.title: Large Columns
list.description: Bootstrap table support large columns, it will auto to show the horizontal scroll bar.

list.title: Minimum Count Columns
list.description: Use minimumCountColumns option to the minimum number of columns to hide from the columns drop down list.

list.title: Show Pagination Switch
list.description: Use showPaginationSwitch option to show the pagination switch button.

list.title: Show Refresh
list.description: Use showRefresh option to show the refresh button.

list.title: Show Toggle
list.description: Use showToggle option to show the toggle button to toggle table / card view.

list.title: Show Fullscreen
list.description: Use showFullscreen option to show the fullscreen button.

list.title: Smart Display
list.description: Use smartDisplay option to display pagination or card view smartly. In this case you can see the changed of the page list.

list.title: Table Escape
list.description: Use escape option to Escapes a string for insertion into HTML, replacing &, <, >, ", `, and \' characters.

list.title: Filter Options
list.description: Use filterOptions option to define the default filter options of algorithm. In this case, we are using bootstrapTable(\'filterBy\', {id: 3, price: \'$1\'}).

list.title: Id Field
list.description: Use idField: \'id\' option to indicate which field is an identity field, and use btSelectItem: \'id\' to set the name of radio or checkbox input.

list.title: Click To Select
list.description: Use clickToSelect option to select checkbox or radiobox when clicking rows.

list.title: Ignore Click To Select On
list.description: Use ignoreClickToSelectOn option to set the ignore elements clickToSelect on.

list.title: Single Select
list.description: Use singleSelect option to allow checkbox selecting only one row.

list.title: Checkbox Header
list.description: Use checkboxHeader: false option to hide check-all checkbox in header row.

list.title: Maintain Meta Data
list.description: Use maintainMetaData option to maintain the meta data(selected rows and hidden rows) on change page and search.

list.title: Multiple Select Row
list.description: Use multipleSelectRow to the multiple selection row. Can use the ctrl+click to select one row or use shift+click to select a range of rows.

list.title: Card View
list.description: Use cardView option to show card view table, for example mobile view.

list.title: Detail View
list.description: Use detailView and detailFormatter options to show detail view.

list.title: Detail View Icon
list.description: Use detailViewIcon: false and detailViewByClick: true options to hide the detail view column (plus/minus icon).

list.title: Detail Filter
list.description: Use detailFilter option to enable expansion per row.

list.title: Custom Toolbar
list.description: Use toolbar option to define the custom toolbars.

list.title: Toolbar Align
list.description: Use toolbarAlign option to indicate how to align the custom toolbar.

list.title: Buttons Toolbar
list.description: Use buttonsToolbar option to indicates the custom buttons toolbar with a selector.

list.title: Buttons Align
list.description: Use buttonsAlign option to indicate how to align the toolbar buttons.

list.title: Buttons Prefix
list.description: Use buttonsPrefix: \'btn btn-sm\' option to defines the prefix of table buttons.

list.title: Buttons Class
list.description: Use buttonsClass: \'primary\' option to defines the class of table buttons.

list.title: Table Icons
list.description: Use icons option to defines icons used in the toolbar, pagination, and details view.

list.title: Icon Size
list.description: Use iconSize option to defines icon size.

list.title: Icons Prefix
list.description: Use iconsPrefix option to defines icon set name. In the case we use ionicons as an example.

list.title: Column Fields
list.description: Use field to define the table fields, the table fields are required for some actions e.g. the load method or the formatter option.

list.title: Column Title
list.description: Use title to define the name/title of the thead. (Default is name of the field)

list.title: Title Tooltip
list.description: Use titleTooltip to define the title as tooltip (html attribute) of the thead.

list.title: Column Class
list.description: Use class to define/overwrite css classes of the column.

list.title: Column Width
list.description: Use width to define the column width.

list.title: Width Unit
list.description: Use widthUnit to define the unit of the column width.

list.title: Rowspan Colspan
list.description: Use rowspan, colspan options to set the group columns header.

list.title: Aligning Columns
list.description: Use align, halign and valign options to set the alignment of the columns and their header.

list.title: Aligning Footer
list.description: Use falign to set the alignment of the columns in the footer.

list.title: Cell Style
list.description: Use cellStyle to define the style of a cell.

list.title: Column Radio
list.description: Use radio to define that a column contains radio(boxes).

list.title: Column Checkbox
list.description: Use checkbox to define that a column contains checkboxes.

list.title: Checkbox Enabled
list.description: Use checkboxEnabled to define if the checkboxes/radio are enabled or not.

list.title: Checkbox Disabled
list.description: Use checkbox and formatter column option to disabled select input.

list.title: Click To Select
list.description: Use clickToSelect option to select checkbox or radiobox when clicking rows. In this case, we disable the Item Name column to click to select.

list.title: Show Select Title
list.description: Use showSelectTitle to show the title of column with radio or singleSelect checkbox option.

list.title: Column Sortable
list.description: Use sortable to define that the column can be sorted.

list.title: Sort Name Order
list.description: Use sortName, sortOrder to define by which column the sort will be done.

list.title: Column Sorter
list.description: Use sorter column option to custom the sorter.

list.title: Column Visible
list.description: Use visible to decide if the column is visible or not.

list.title: Column Switchable
list.description: Use switchable to decide if the column is switchable or not.

list.title: Card Visible
list.description: Use cardVisible to to decide if the column is visible or not in the card view.

list.title: Column Searchable
list.description: Use searchable to define if a column can be found through searching.

list.title: Column Formatter
list.description: Use formatter column option to format the display of bootstrap table column.

list.title: Footer Formatter
list.description: Use footerFormatter to format the footer columns.

list.title: Detail Formatter
list.description: Use detailFormatter to Format your detail view when detailView and detailViewByClick is set to true. Return a String and it will be appended into the detail view cell.

list.title: Search Formatter
list.description: Use searchFormatter to define that the formatted data will be used while searching. You can search Formatted and Price to the difference.

list.title: Column Escape
list.description: Use escape to escape data (e.g. to prevent javascript injections).

list.title: Column Events
list.description: Use events column option to define the events for the formatter column.

list.title: Get Options
list.description: Return the options object: $table.bootstrapTable(\'getOptions\').

list.title: Refresh Options
list.description: Refresh table options: $table.bootstrapTable(\'refreshOptions\', {}).

list.title: Get Data
list.description: Get the loaded data of table: $table.bootstrapTable(\'getData\').

list.title: Get Selections
list.description: Return selected rows: $table.bootstrapTable(\'getSelections\').

list.title: Get All Selections
list.description: Return all selected rows contain search or filter: $table.bootstrapTable(\'getAllSelections\').

list.title: Load
list.description: Load the data to table, the old rows will be removed: $table.bootstrapTable(\'load\', data).

list.title: Append
list.description: Append the data to table: $table.bootstrapTable(\'append\', data).

list.title: Prepend
list.description: Prepend the data to table: $table.bootstrapTable(\'prepend\', data).

list.title: Remove
list.description: Remove data from table: $table.bootstrapTable(\'remove\', {field: \'id\', values: ids}).

list.title: Remove All
list.description: Remove all data from table: $table.bootstrapTable(\'removeAll\').

list.title: Insert Row
list.description: Insert a new row: $table.bootstrapTable(\'insertRow\', {index: 1, row: row}).

list.title: Update Row
list.description: Update the specified row: $table.bootstrapTable(\'updateRow\', {index: 1, row: row}).

list.title: Get Row By Unique Id
list.description: Get row data by unique id: $table.bootstrapTable(\'getRowByUniqueId\', 1).

list.title: Update By Unique Id
list.description: Update the specified row by unique id: $table.bootstrapTable(\'updateByUniqueId\', {id: 3, row: row}).

list.title: Remove By Unique Id
list.description: Remove row data by unique id: $table.bootstrapTable(\'removeByUniqueId\', 1).

list.title: Update Cell
list.description: Update the specified cell: $table.bootstrapTable(\'updateCell\', {index: 1, field: \'name\', value: \'Updated Name\'}).

list.title: Update Cell By Unique Id
list.description: Update the specified cell by unique id: $table.bootstrapTable(\'updateCellByUniqueId\', {id: 3, field: \'name\', value: \'Updated Name\'}).

list.title: Show/Hide Row
list.description:
Show/Hide the specified row:
$table.bootstrapTable(\'showRow\', {index:1})
$table.bootstrapTable(\'hideRow\', {index:1}).

list.title: Get Hidden Rows
list.description:
Get all rows hidden and if you pass the show parameter true the rows will be shown again, otherwise, the method only will return the rows hidden:
$table.bootstrapTable(\'getHiddenRows\')
$table.bootstrapTable(\'getHiddenRows\', true).

list.title: Show/Hide Column
list.description:
Show/Hide the specified column:
$table.bootstrapTable(\'showColumn\', \'name\')
$table.bootstrapTable(\'hideColumn\', \'name\').

list.title: Get Visible/Hidden Columns
list.description:
Get Visible/Hidden columns:
$table.bootstrapTable(\'getVisibleColumns\')
$table.bootstrapTable(\'getHiddenColumns\').

list.title: Show/Hide All Columns
list.description:
Show/Hide all columns:
$table.bootstrapTable(\'showAllColumns\')
$table.bootstrapTable(\'hideAllColumns\').

list.title: Merge Cells
list.description: Merge some cells to one cell: $table.bootstrapTable(\'mergeCells\', {index: 1, field: \'name\', colspan: 2, rowspan: 3}).

list.title: Check/Uncheck All
list.description:
Check/Uncheck all current page rows:
$table.bootstrapTable(\'checkAll\')
$table.bootstrapTable(\'uncheckAll\').

list.title: Check Invert
list.description: Invert check of current page rows: $table.bootstrapTable(\'checkInvert\').

list.title: Check/Uncheck
list.description:
Check/Uncheck a row, the row index start with 0:
$table.bootstrapTable(\'check\', 1)
$table.bootstrapTable(\'uncheck\', 1).

list.title: Check/Uncheck By
list.description:
Check/Uncheck rows by array of values:
$table.bootstrapTable(\'checkBy\', {field: \'id\', values: [1, 2, 3]})
$table.bootstrapTable(\'uncheckBy\', {field: \'id\', values: [1, 2, 3]}).

list.title: Refresh
list.description: Refresh the remote server data: $table.bootstrapTable(\'refresh\').

list.title: Destroy
list.description: Destroy the bootstrap table: $table.bootstrapTable(\'destroy\').

list.title: Reset View
list.description: Reset the bootstrap table view, for example reset the table height: $table.bootstrapTable(\'resetView\').

list.title: Show/Hide Loading
list.description:
Show/hide the loading: $table.bootstrapTable(\'showLoading\')
$table.bootstrapTable(\'hideLoading\').

list.title: Toggle Pagination
list.description: Toggle the pagination option: $table.bootstrapTable(\'togglePagination\').

list.title: Toggle Fullscreen
list.description: Toggle Fullscreen: $table.bootstrapTable(\'toggleFullscreen\').

list.title: Toggle View
list.description: Toggle the card/table view: <code>$table.bootstrapTable(\'toggleView\').

list.title: Reset Search
list.description: Set the search text: $table.bootstrapTable(\'resetSearch\').

list.title: Filter By
list.description: Filter data in table (can use only in client-side): $table.bootstrapTable(\'filterBy\', {id: [1, 2, 3]}).

list.title: Scroll To
list.description:
Scroll to the number value position, set \'bottom\' means scroll to the bottom:
$table.bootstrapTable(\'scrollTo\', 0)
$table.bootstrapTable(\'scrollTo\', {unit: \'rows\', value: index})
$table.bootstrapTable(\'scrollTo\', \'bottom\').

list.title: Get Scroll Position
list.description: Get the current scroll position, the unit is \'px\': $table.bootstrapTable(\'getScrollPosition\').

list.title: Select/Prev/Next Page
list.description:
Go to the a specified/previous/next page:
$table.bootstrapTable(\'selectPage\', 1)
$table.bootstrapTable(\'prevPage\')
$table.bootstrapTable(\'nextPage\').

list.title: Toggle Detail View
list.description: Toggle the row if the detail view option is set: $table.bootstrapTable(\'toggleDetailView\', index).

list.title: Expand/Collapse Row
list.description:
$table.bootstrapTable(\'expandRow\', 1)
$table.bootstrapTable(\'collapseRow\', 1).

list.title: Expand/Collapse All Rows
list.description:
$table.bootstrapTable(\'expandAllRows\')
$table.bootstrapTable(\'collapseAllRows\').

list.title: Update Column Title
list.description: Update the field title of column: $table.bootstrapTable(\'updateColumnTitle\', {field: \'name\', title: \'Updated Name\'}).

list.title: Update Format Text
list.description: Update the localizations format text: $table.bootstrapTable(\'updateFormatText\', \'formatSearch\', \'Enter keywords...\').
